short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies all open tabs into mardkown list of links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine how much time it takes to create markdown list of ten open web pages?

With this extension it will be just one click!

You can copy links in markdown, jira and html formats. Also there is a wysiwyg format which is suitable for Confluence, OneNote, Word, etc.

Sources can be found here: https://github.com/mac2000/tabs2markdown
